title: Merge Duplicate Customer Accounts
description: A system audit reveals a customer has two accounts under slightly different email addresses. An agent needs to merge them.

tasks.description: Identify the two duplicate customer accounts and their associated order histories.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the details for both accounts.

tasks.description: Select the primary account and merge the order history from the secondary account into it.
Disable the secondary account and notify the customer of the merge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent deactivates the duplicate and informs the customer.
